thread.title: Putin wins landslide victory in Russian presidential election

title: Putin wins landslide victory in Russian presidential election
text:
Putin wins landslide victory in Russian presidential election Monday, March 19, 2018 - 01:09 
Russian President Vladimir Putin won a landslide re-election victory on Sunday, extending his rule over the world’s largest country for another six years at a time when his ties with the West are on a hostile trajectory.   
Russian President Vladimir Putin won a landslide re-election victory on Sunday, extending his rule over the world’s largest country for another six years at a time when his ties with the West are on a hostile trajectory.  //reut.rs/2pmUava
